name: Blazing Flint Ore
desc:
Known as a raw ore due to the radiant glow it harbors.
When grasped in one's hand, one can feel the fiery pulse thrumming within the stone. Perhaps one day, held high against the starry sky, it might emit a gentle gleam that illuminates the night.

customize.text: Offer up Blazing Flint Ore to the Lord of the Night to strengthen your connection with the Night Kingdom.

"The first flint lights up the distant past, and the land of journey's beginning — we call it home. The way back be no more; yet when you and I embrace the night, pure as a mirror it remains, and forever shall it stay."
"The second flint lights up the juncture of setting forth, and the day journey began — we call it farewell. In its departure, the unchanging world betrays us; yet still some try to grasp its shadow."

"The third flint lights up a daytime of celebration, and a moment when hearts are opened up — we call it friendship. This journey is far from a solitary trial; not only the winds, but human hearts too, embrace us along the way."

"The fourth flint lights up a tempestuous night of rain-soaked despair, and a sea of anguishing descent — we call it failure. Fighting against the rising tide, a little boat is very nearly submerged; yet thankfully, it cannot prize the oars from our hands."

"The fifth flint lights up those days of pushing onward, and the stones with which tall towers are built — we call it determination. Higher we climb, higher and higher; until at last, we glimpse the destination we have long dreamed of."

"The sixth flint lights up the movement of arrival, and the seats upon which we may evermore rest — we call it a miracle. Together, we have brought this journey to its conclusion; yet instead of an ending, let us see this as a new beginning."

value.text: Reach Tribe Reputation Level 4 with the tribes in Natlan
